sub_rules.content: Annotations applying to a field also appear immediately after the documentation block
sub_rules.formalization: documentation_block,field.annotations must be arranged in the given order

sub_rules.content:
but in this case, multiple annotations (possibly parameterized) may be listed on the same line; for example:

@Partial @Mock DataLoader loader;
sub_rules.formalization: the quantity of line .annotation could be greater than 1
